EmailTemplate.description: Notify licensee their Credential was successfully Reinstated
EmailTemplate.name: Credential Reinstatement Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: DSPS Reinstatement Complete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This message is auto-generated by the eSLA
*Please do not reply to this email*
{!Today()}
Dear {!Renewal_Application__c.Applicant__c},
Credential number {!Renewal_Application__c.License__c} has been successfully reinstated and is now valid through {!Renewal_Application__c.Renewal_Expiration_Date__c} .
If you have any questions please contact the agency during business hours at (608) 266-2112, or send an email to dsps@wisconsin.gov.
Sincerely,
Department of Safety and Professional Services
